q_and_a_data.subject: ComfyUI_LatentToRGB
q_and_a_data.question: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_LatentToRGB custom node?
q_and_a_data.answer: The ComfyUI_LatentToRGB custom node is designed to convert latent images to RGB format.

q_and_a_data.subject: ComfyUI_LatentToRGB
q_and_a_data.question: Where does the transformation matrix used in ComfyUI_LatentToRGB come from?
q_and_a_data.answer: The transformation matrix for the ComfyUI_LatentToRGB node is taken from a discussion on the Hugging Face forums: https://discuss.huggingface.co/t/decoding-latents-to-rgb-without-upscaling/23204/2.
